quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.
name: Colin Powell

quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
name: Brad Henry

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing.
name: Chantal Kreviazuk

quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: While I thought that I was learning how to live, I have been learning how to die.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: You cannot open a book without learning something.
name: Confucius

quote: I learned the value of hard work by working hard.
name: Margaret Mead

quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
name: Abigail Adams

quote: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: Each life is made up of mistakes and learning, waiting and growing, practicing patience and being persistent.
name: Billy Graham

quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.
name: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Everything is a learning process: any time you fall over, it's just teaching you to stand up the next time.
name: Joel Edgerton

quote: Research is creating new knowledge.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is nobody can take it away from you.
name: B. B. King

quote: Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson.
name: Elon Musk

quote: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and by falling over.
name: Richard Branson

quote: A good teacher must be able to put himself in the place of those who find learning hard.
name: Eliphas Levi

quote: We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Research is formalized curiosity. It is poking and prying with a purpose.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?
name: Albert Einstein

quote: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.
name: Confucius

quote: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for he was born in another time.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: I learned long ago, never to wrestle with a pig. You get dirty, and besides, the pig likes it.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The library is the temple of learning, and learning has liberated more people than all the wars in history.
name: Carl T. Rowan

quote: Success in management requires learning as fast as the world is changing.
name: Warren Bennis

quote: I don't love studying. I hate studying. I like learning. Learning is beautiful.
name: Natalie Portman

quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
name: Bill Gates

quote: The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: You're never too old to start learning, and you're never too young to aim high and achieve great things.
name: Asa Hutchinson

quote: As I'm getting older, I'm really learning unconditional love and loyalty are extremely important.
name: Bindi Irwin

quote: A happy life is one spent in learning, earning, and yearning.
name: Lillian Gish

quote: Flying is learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss.
name: Douglas Adams

quote: I never learn anything talking. I only learn things when I ask questions.
name: Lou Holtz

quote: I like to listen. I have learned a great deal from listening carefully. Most people never listen.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Being transgender isn't a medical transition. It's a process of learning to love yourself for who you are.
name: Jazz Jennings

quote: Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.
name: Morgan Freeman

quote: The things that have been most valuable to me I did not learn in school.
name: Will Smith

quote: The excitement of learning separates youth from old age. As long as you're learning you're not old.
name: Rosalyn Sussman Yalow

quote: Do your best and keep learning - that's what I believe in.
name: Suriya

quote: I'm a very strong believer in listening and learning from others.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: Waiting is a period of learning. The longer we wait, the more we hear about him for whom we are waiting.
name: Henri Nouwen

quote: You aren't learning anything when you're talking.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: I am still learning.
name: Michelangelo

quote: I am not afraid of storms for I am learning how to sail my ship.
name: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Live a life full of humility, gratitude, intellectual curiosity, and never stop learning.
name: Gza

quote: The life ahead can only be glorious if you learn to live in total harmony with the Lord.
name: Sai Baba

quote: There are three ingredients in the good life: learning, earning and yearning.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: Seeing much, suffering much, and studying much, are the three pillars of learning.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Every industrial revolution brings along a learning revolution.
name: Alexander De Croo

quote: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Question everything. Learn something. Answer nothing.
name: Euripides

quote: Learning is pleasurable but doing is the height of enjoyment.
name: Novalis

quote: I want to keep learning, keep exploring, keep doing more.
name: Jessye Norman

quote: I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him.
name: Galileo Galilei

quote: In youth we learn; in age we understand.
name: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: To know oneself is to study oneself in action with another person.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: Learning how to learn is life's most important skill.
name: Tony Buzan

quote: Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous.
name: Confucius

quote: A man only learns in two ways, one by reading, and the other by association with smarter people.
name: Will Rogers

quote: The individualization of learning fundamentally redefines the role of assessment.
name: Sebastian Thrun

quote: Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Learning networking basics is only a gateway to career growth and exploration.
name: Tae Yoo

quote: A little learning, indeed, may be a dangerous thing, but the want of learning is a calamity to any people.
name: Frederick Douglass

quote: Every outing is a learning experience.
name: Drew Pomeranz

quote: There's no mystery to it. Nothing more complicated than learning lines and putting on a costume.
name: Morgan Freeman

quote: Art in the classroom not only spurs creativity, it also inspires learning.
name: Mickey Hart

quote: I see travelling as a great learning process, and my biggest dream is to travel the world.
name: Pooja Hegde

quote: A child's learning is a function more of the characteristics of his classmates than those of the teacher.
name: James S. Coleman

quote: Losers live in the past. Winners learn from the past and enjoy working in the present toward the future.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: I'm always writing and learning. It's about growth. So I'm growing as a musician, as a guitarist.
name: D'Angelo

quote: Your happiness is at the intersection of your passions and learning from great people.
name: Scott Weiss

quote: I'm learning to deal with my loneliness because then nobody can muck me around any more.
name: Amanda Eliasch

quote: I am always ready to learn although I do not always like being taught.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Being ignorant is not so much a shame, as being unwilling to learn.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Every immigrant who comes here should be required within five years to learn English or leave the country.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Being a part of the action is just incredible. I loved doing stunt stuff. I loved learning to ride.
name: Anna Popplewell

quote: One of the reasons people stop learning is that they become less and less willing to risk failure.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: Life is like playing a violin solo in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: 'Cars' was about Lightning McQueen learning to slow down and to enjoy life. The journey is the reward.
name: John Lasseter

quote: The first problem for all of us, men and women, is not to learn, but to unlearn.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: The learning process is something you can incite, literally incite, like a riot.
name: Audre Lorde

quote: Whoso neglects learning in his youth, loses the past and is dead for the future.
name: Euripides

quote: The only thing that interferes with my learning is my education.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: A weed is a plant that has mastered every survival skill except for learning how to grow in rows.
name: Doug Larson

quote: The best thing we can do with rejection is to make it a learning experience - rejection is a great teacher.
name: Adena Friedman

quote: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
name: Vince Lombardi

quote: The love of learning, the sequestered nooks, And all the sweet serenity of books.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Much learning does not teach understanding.
name: Heraclitus

quote: Doing a documentary is about discovering, being open, learning, and following curiosity.
name: Spike Jonze

quote: We come to love not by finding a perfect person but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
name: Sam Keen

quote: Everything I learned I learned from the movies.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The fun thing about Snapchat is really the surprise and the joy that comes from learning how to use it.
name: Evan Spiegel

quote: The least of the work of learning is done in the classroom.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: Scholastic learning and polemical divinity retarded the growth of all true knowledge.
name: David Hume

quote: And I believe that the best learning process of any kind of craft is just to look at the work of others.
name: Wole Soyinka

quote: As an entrepreneur, you never stop learning.
name: Daymond John

quote: I am forever learning and changing.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: The top experts in the world are ardent students. The day you stop learning, you're definitely not an expert.
name: Brendon Burchard

quote: The knack of flying is learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss.
name: Douglas Adams

quote: Cross-cultural learning and studying abroad can be transformative.
name: Amal Clooney

quote: Some people are so busy learning the tricks of the trade that they never learn the trade.
name: Vernon Law

quote: Every day, I'm learning new things about myself. Every day, I'm learning new things about life.
name: Aquaria

quote: No matter what, you've got to always follow your passion in life and always keep learning.
name: Harold Hamm

quote: I'm always learning and trying new things. When you stop learning, you start dying.
name: Ellen Burstyn

quote: I've been studying the planets and learning the personalities of each planet.
name: Dr. Dre

quote: As long as I'm learning something, I figure I'm OK - it's a decent day.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When I think about my career, my successes are built on learning from failures.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: A camera is a tool for learning how to see without a camera.
name: Dorothea Lange

quote: Everybody who is incapable of learning has taken to teaching.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Men have a respect for scholarship and learning greatly out of proportion to the use they commonly serve.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I am learning that in life it is OK to travel in darkness, not knowing what your next move is.
name: Cobie Smulders

quote: A little learning is a dangerous thing; Drink deep, or taste not the Pierian spring.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: I learnt not to be desperate in bad times and am learning not to be bullish when times are good.
name: John Elkann

quote: Learning to play with a big amplifier is like trying to control an elephant.
name: Ritchie Blackmore

quote: You teach best what you most need to learn.
name: Richard Bach

quote: I'm always interested in learning something new.
name: Katherine Johnson

quote: I'd rather learn from one bird how to sing than teach ten thousand stars how not to dance.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: As I enter a new phase of life and my circle broadens, I start learning new things.
name: Kapil Dev

quote: The laptop brings back a more seamless kind of learning.
name: Nicholas Negroponte

quote: The only things worth learning are the things you learn after you know it all.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: Defense is a definite part of the game, and a great part of defense is learning to play it without fouling.
name: John Wooden

quote: Learning too soon our limitations, we never learn our powers.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: The hardest job kids face today is learning good manners without seeing any.
name: Fred Astaire

quote: The learning process continues until the day you die.
name: Kirk Douglas

quote: Learning to make films is very easy. Learning what to make films about is very hard.
name: George Lucas

quote: I am learning the importance of living in the moment.
name: Sushant Singh Rajput

quote: Always keep learning. It keeps you young.
name: Patty Berg

quote: It takes a long time to learn that a courtroom is the last place in the world for learning the truth.
name: Alice Koller

quote: There's no learning without trying lots of ideas and failing lots of times.
name: Jonathan Ive

quote: Learning is not compulsory... neither is survival.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: There is a cure for anti-aging that actually works - it's called lifelong learning.
name: Robin S. Sharma

quote: Learning to give up on perfection may be just about the most romantic move any of us could make.
name: Alain de Botton

quote: I have been adopted by the millennials, and I'm enjoying every minute of it! I'm learning a new language.
name: Maxine Waters

quote: I still feel like I'm learning a lot and have a lot to learn and improve on.
name: Anderson Cooper

quote: I've matured - just growing up and learning more about my sport and more about myself.
name: Michelle Carter

quote: Every tournament I go to, I'm kind of learning a little bit mentally and on the course.
name: Jordan Spieth

quote: I like a challenge. I like learning new skills because I didn't learn much at school.
name: Bernard Sumner

quote: This life is a process of learning.
name: Lauryn Hill

quote: The thing about school is that if you're forced into learning stuff, you're not going to be into it.
name: Joey Ramone

quote: I never really had the fun teens of exploring the world because I was sitting at home, learning programming.
name: Markus Persson

quote: No man ever prayed heartily without learning something.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Some books leave us free and some books make us free.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Anytime you ride against the best in the world, it becomes a learning process.
name: Bonnie Blair

quote: A University should be a place of light, of liberty, and of learning.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: A single conversation across the table with a wise man is better than ten years mere study of books.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: It is only when we forget all our learning that we begin to know.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: As long as you live, keep learning how to live.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: It's what you learn after you know it all that counts.
name: John Wooden

quote: There's no way I can justify my salary level, but I'm learning to live with it.
name: Drew Carey

quote: Learning is finding out what you already know.
name: Richard Bach

quote: A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well.
name: Dan Rather

quote: I would fain grow old learning many things.
name: Plato

quote: We do not learn; and what we call learning is only a process of recollection.
name: Plato

quote: The only real progress lies in learning to be wrong all alone.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Teaching is the royal road to learning.
name: Jessamyn West

quote: Only by learning to live in harmony with your contradictions can you keep it all afloat.
name: Audre Lorde

quote: Gardening is learning, learning, learning. That's the fun of them. You're always learning.
name: Helen Mirren

quote: Learning is a tunnel experience that makes us think more broadly.
name: Anna Deavere Smith

quote: If I am through learning, I am through.
name: John Wooden

quote: Justice turns the scale, bringing to some learning through suffering.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Making a wrong decision is understandable. Refusing to search continually for learning is not.
name: Phil Crosby

quote: I'm learning the power of going away for the weekend and keeping myself company.
name: Zoe Saldana

quote: Why waste time learning, when ignorance is instantaneous?
name: Bill Watterson

quote: One of the greatest and simplest tools for learning more and growing is doing more.
name: Washington Irving

quote: I never learned from a man who agreed with me.
name: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: I think one of the great things about being a musician is that you never stop learning.
name: Yo-Yo Ma

quote: Try to learn something about everything and everything about something.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: Every opportunity I got, I took it as a learning experience.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: My philosophy is my learning process. Until you die, you must evolve and improve.
name: Miyavi

quote: The most useful piece of learning for the uses of life is to unlearn what is untrue.
name: Antisthenes

quote: Learning music by reading about it is like making love by mail.
name: Luciano Pavarotti

quote: If you desire ease, forsake learning.
name: Nagarjuna

quote: Rich people without wisdom and learning are but sheep with golden fleeces.
name: Solon

quote: I do think observing is important in learning.
name: Roger Deakins

quote: The trick in life is learning how to deal with it.
name: Helen Mirren

quote: I think you're working and learning until you die.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: There's no shortcut to learning a craft; you just have to put the years in.
name: Kylie Minogue

quote: I was working with Jay Z while I was still learning how to be who I was about to become.
name: Travis Scott

quote: Learning carries within itself certain dangers because out of necessity one has to learn from one's enemies.
name: Leon Trotsky

quote: The fundament upon which all our knowledge and learning rests is the inexplicable.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Never stop learning; knowledge doubles every fourteen months.
name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Recipes tell you nothing. Learning techniques is the key.
name: Tom Colicchio

quote: I am learning all the time. The tombstone will be my diploma.
name: Eartha Kitt

quote: Learning happens in the minds and souls, not in the databases of multiple-choice tests.
name: Ken Robinson

quote: I like learning. I've been studying Japanese for years now, but it's really hard.
name: RM

quote: I fear the boredom that comes with not learning and not taking chances.
name: Robert Fulghum

quote: Learning from the past helps to ensure that mistakes are not repeated.
name: Monica Johnson

quote: Poverty must not be a bar to learning and learning must offer an escape from poverty.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: In this life, I've learned to be patient. And I'm still learning... Even now, I wish things would go quicker.
name: Benjamin Clementine

quote: For me, art is about learning and about living with people. It's alive.
name: Miuccia Prada

quote: Always be listening and learning.
name: Adena Friedman

quote: I travel like a maniac. I travel more than anyone I know. I love learning the languages.
name: Quincy Jones

quote: Only the other world has substance and reality; only good deeds and holy learning have tangible worth.
name: Abraham Cahan

quote: I've been doing a lot of learning from mistakes, first and foremost, and building off that.
name: William Green

quote: There is a huge value in learning with instant feedback.
name: Anant Agarwal

quote: Neither comprehension nor learning can take place in an atmosphere of anxiety.
name: Rose Kennedy

quote: Comedy is learning to be funny, and you learn to be funny in small rooms with young audiences.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: Wisdom has never made a bigot, but learning has.
name: Josh Billings

quote: No matter what age you are, there's a lot of room for learning.
name: Tony Bennett

quote: I'm always learning. I have to.
name: Neymar

quote: He who has imagination without learning has wings but no feet.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: If you're going to go through hell... I suggest you come back learning something.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: There is only one thing more painful than learning from experience and that is not learning from experience.
name: Archibald MacLeish

quote: Being a geek is all about learning the inventories of things.
name: Adam Savage

quote: I think we need to recognize that learning is a lifelong goal, a lifelong experience.
name: Adrian Grenier

quote: The delights of self-discovery are always available.
name: Gail Sheehy

quote: Acknowledging mistakes and learning from them are the first steps.
name: Travis Kalanick

quote: Just because you have a learning difficulty or difference doesn't mean you aren't smart.
name: Gavin Newsom

quote: I am just learning to notice the different colors of the stars, and already begin to have a new enjoyment.
name: Maria Mitchell

quote: The brighter you are, the more you have to learn.
name: Don Herold

quote: Learning to trust is one of life's most difficult tasks.
name: Isaac Watts

quote: Learning by doing, peer-to-peer teaching, and computer simulation are all part of the same equation.
name: Nicholas Negroponte

quote: I have spent an awful lot of time listening to Canadians, learning from them, working with them.
name: Justin Trudeau

quote: Learning, n. The kind of ignorance distinguishing the studious.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Learning how to operate a soul figures to take time.
name: Timothy Leary

quote: A man of great memory without learning hath a rock and a spindle and no staff to spin.
name: George Herbert

quote: You never finish learning.
name: Hubert de Givenchy

quote: Let ignorance talk as it will, learning has its value.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: The mind ought sometimes to be diverted that it may return to better thinking.
name: Phaedrus

quote: You have to learn and keep learning.
name: Gil Scott-Heron

quote: Life is about learning; when you stop learning, you die.
name: Tom Clancy

quote: In university they don't tell you that the greater part of the law is learning to tolerate fools.
name: Doris Lessing

quote: To be proud of learning is the greatest ignorance.
name: Jeremy Taylor

quote: I love nature and enjoy learning new skills.
name: Leona Lewis

quote: I've learned my lessons, but I'm also still learning them.
name: Benjamin Clementine

quote: My rookie year was huge for me as far as the learning curve, especially those last three games.
name: Tim Tebow

quote: 'Dancing with The Stars' is like learning a new sport with lots of bumps and bruises.
name: Romeo Miller

quote: Kindness has converted more sinners than zeal, eloquence, or learning.
name: Frederick William Faber

quote: You have to grow thick skin and that only comes with time and learning.
name: Karlie Kloss

quote: The world of learning is so broad, and the human soul is so limited in power!
name: Maria Mitchell

quote: Learning how to be persuasive has been really crucial to my life both professionally and personally.
name: Amanda de Cadenet

quote: Knowledge is exploding, so you need to commit yourself to a plan for lifelong learning.
name: Don Tapscott

quote: We are learning, too, that the love of beauty is one of Nature's greatest healers.
name: Ellsworth Huntington

quote: I love learning, and I think that curiosity is a wonderful gift.
name: Andie MacDowell

quote: Learning starts with failure; the first failure is the beginning of education.
name: John Hersey

quote: I'm still learning and trying to become a better actor. I still feel insecurity.
name: Dave Bautista

quote: Responsibility for learning belongs to the student, regardless of age.
name: Robert Martin

quote: Every job you do, you gain more experience. You never stop learning.
name: Joanna Cassidy

quote: As humans, we are constantly learning and changing and evolving, and I think that is so beautiful.
name: Mija

quote: Learning is the gateway to adventure.
name: Princess Beatrice of York

quote: Just learning to think in another language allows you to see your own culture in a better viewpoint.
name: Gates McFadden

quote: When I was 12 years old, I got interested in learning English.
name: Jack Ma

quote: The minute that you're not learning I believe you're dead.
name: Jack Nicholson

quote: Learning sleeps and snores in libraries, but wisdom is everywhere, wide awake, on tiptoe.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Knowledge, learning, is an eternal thing.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Sister Hinckley and I are learning that the so-called golden years are laced with lead.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: I spend a lot of time learning about bird watching.
name: Nikki Giovanni

quote: Learning to read music in Braille and play by ear helped me develop a damn good memory.
name: Ray Charles

quote: I spend more time learning about Buddhism than English, which is why my English today is still bad.
name: Jet Li

quote: Going to a party, for me, is as much a learning experience as, you know, sitting in a lecture.
name: Natalie Portman

quote: It's not about the failure, it's about learning from the failures. Failure itself cannot be celebrated.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: Learning hath gained most by those books by which the printers have lost.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Learning something new is fun.
name: Alex Trebek

quote: Learn as much by writing as by reading.
name: John Dalberg-Acton

quote: Perfecting oneself is as much unlearning as it is learning.
name: Edsger Dijkstra

quote: He that knew all that learning ever writ, Knew only this - that he knew nothing yet.
name: Aphra Behn

quote: As an actor, you keep learning. There's no end to it.
name: Sridevi

quote: I'm learning how strong I am, how resilient I am. I'm learning my weaknesses.
name: Amy Purdy

quote: It's my dream to make learning as addictive as a video game.
name: Sebastian Thrun

quote: I feel like if I'm going to take time reading, I better be learning.
name: Dan Brown

quote: Not to unlearn what you have learned is the most necessary kind of learning.
name: Antisthenes

quote: Learning what you don't want is how you know what you do want.
name: Robin Wright

quote: A humble knowledge of thyself is a surer way to God than a deep search after learning.
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: I'm kind of still learning my voice and learning my style.
name: Shawn Mendes

quote: Out of silence is born concentration, and from that comes learning.
name: Stephen Hough

quote: Learning how to contract your power and personality is of incredible importance.
name: Daniel Lubetzky

quote: There is an extraordinary collaborative spirit when you are learning and growing.
name: Robbie Robertson

quote: It has been said that 80% of what people learn is visual.
name: Allen Klein

quote: If you aren't learning, you are regressing, because more growth comes from failure than from success.
name: Shahid Khan

quote: I'm not crazy. But I am different. I'm still learning about myself.
name: El DeBarge

quote: Love of learning led to monasteries, which became the cradle of academic guilds.
name: John Ortberg

quote: We should regret our mistakes and learn from them, but never carry them forward into the future with us.
name: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quote: As I'd go out learning to surf, I'd feel the power of waves coming over my body. It's like you're with God.
name: Dick Dale

quote: I'm learning that you can be comfortable and still look beautiful.
name: Selena Gomez

quote: Hungry people cannot be good at learning or producing anything, except perhaps violence.
name: Pearl Bailey

quote: All men begin their learning with Homer.
name: Xenophanes

quote: You can enjoy stargazing just by going out and learning a couple constellations with your kids.
name: Tim Ferriss

quote: In software design, it's all about making a guess, trying it, and then learning from the experience.
name: Stewart Butterfield

quote: In my bachelor days, the priority wasn't learning to cook.
name: Rob Lowe

quote: Learning is a critical part of our mission and organizational culture.
name: Charles Best

quote: Learning how to work and learning how to fail is important.
name: Jamie Moyer

quote: I eventually became proud of my strikeouts, because each one represented another learning experience.
name: Willie Stargell

quote: 80 percent of learning is visual, so children who can't afford vision correction are at such a disadvantage.
name: Ellen Hollman

quote: As a species, we can at times be dimwitted and cruel. But we're also capable of learning.
name: K. A. Applegate

quote: I'm forever learning and that's why I'm always able to create new styles and new dimensions of hip-hop.
name: Doug E. Fresh

quote: I'm still learning, and that's what life is about.
name: Cary Elwes

quote: Words are but wind; and learning is nothing but words; ergo, learning is nothing but wind.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: The young are adept at learning, but even more adept at avoiding it.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The main part of intellectual education is not the acquisition of facts, but learning how to make facts live.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: I'm learning English at the moment. I can say 'Big Ben', 'Hello Rodney', 'Tower Bridge' and 'Loo'.
name: Cher

quote: I was so enthralled watching 'Guys and Dolls' and learning about the Rat Pack.
name: Brendon Urie

quote: The trouble with learning from experience is that you never graduate.
name: Doug Larson

quote: There is no royal road to learning; no short cut to the acquirement of any art.
name: Anthony Trollope

quote: The audience, upon learning that the real Buffalo Bill was present, gave several cheers between the acts.
name: Buffalo Bill

quote: I'm passionate about learning. I'm passionate about life.
name: Tom Cruise

quote: You don't always have to have the most amazing story. It's learning to share the story you have that counts.
name: Amy Purdy

quote: Philosophy is a kind of journey, ever learning yet never arriving at the ideal perfection of truth.
name: Albert Pike

quote: The Seinfeld motto: No learning, no hugging.
name: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: You discover yourself through the research of your work.
name: Carine Roitfeld

quote: We are a long time in learning that all our strength and salvation is in God.
name: David Brainerd

quote: I grow old learning something new every day.
name: Solon

quote: The soul is everlasting, and its learning experience is lifetime after lifetime.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: You never stop learning.
name: Adena Friedman

quote: Learning is the new skill. Imagination, creation and asking new questions are at its core.
name: Sugata Mitra

quote: Sibling relationships have been underemphasised in learning about child development.
name: Robert J. Waldinger

quote: For me, becoming a man had a lot to do with learning communication, and I learned about that by acting.
name: Adam Driver

quote: Every record I do is a learning process for how I want to do the next one.
name: Matisyahu

quote: I really am a chick from Long Island who's just learning along with everyone.
name: Amy Schumer

quote: You are always learning; there is a lot of grey; don't take things for granted.
name: Lisa Marie Presley

quote: It is what we know already that often prevents us from learning.
name: Claude Bernard

quote: Experience is making mistakes and learning from them.
name: Bill Ackman

quote: It's not the teaching, it's the learning.
name: Sly Stone

quote: I can get motivated seeing a kid at my son's school overcome a learning disability.
name: Jason Alexander

quote: The more painful it is, tragically, the more you do learn, though, that's the good part.
name: Sylvia Browne

quote: What people actually refer to as research nowadays is really just Googling.
name: Dermot Mulroney
